configuration.name: Jakarta Servlet Examples (Tomcat)
configuration.description: The Servlet examples originally developed for Tomcat. Can be found via HTTP at /servlets-examples/ after installation. These examples give a basic introduction to Servlet development along with sample code.

prerequisite.description: This version of the Servlet Examples works with the Geronimo/Tomcat distribution. It is not intended to run in the Geronimo/Jetty distribution. There is a separate version of the Welcome application that works with Jetty. Please install the version appropriate to your Geronimo distribution.
